mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.product_id AS "productId", a.product_name AS "productName", a.product_price AS "productPrice", a.product_num AS "productNum", a.area_id AS "areaId", a.area_name AS "areaName", a.cabinet_no AS "cabinetNo", a.drawer_no AS "drawerNo", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.payment_time AS "paymentTime"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_goods( id, order_no, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_num, area_id, area_name, cabinet_no, drawer_no, create_time, update_time, payment_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNo}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productNum}, #{areaId}, #{areaName}, #{cabinetNo}, #{drawerNo}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{paymentTime} )
